title: Mixed Magics
description: Glorious rejacket of the story collection set in the worlds of Chrestomanci. The stories featured in this collection Warlock at the WheelStealer of SoulsCarol Oneir's Hundredth DreamThe Sage of Theare Everybody's favourite nine-lifed enchanter makes a guest appearance in each tale. Plus man favourites from theChrestomanci novels - and a cast of thousands! With illustrations by Tim Stevens.
author: Diana Wynne Jones
